message_history.content:
Answer the given question. You must conduct reasoning inside <think> and </think> first every time you get new information. After reasoning, if you find you lack some knowledge, you can call a search engine by <search> query </search> and it will return the top searched results between <information> and </information>. You can search as many times as your want. If you find no further external knowledge needed, you can directly provide the answer inside <answer> and </answer>, without detailed illustrations. For example, <answer> Beijing </answer>. Question: I want to buy a camera to take landscape photos. I heard that Nikon is good at taking landscapes and want to buy a mirrorless camera. Please help me collect the information of all Nikon Z series products as of the first half of 2025. The information I want to know is: effective pixels, weight, maximum frames per second, shutter speed range, highest number of focus points, digital image processor, ISO range, in-camera shock reduction technology.
The weight specifically refers to the weight of the camera body itself, including the battery and memory card; The highest number of focus points refers to the higher value between single-point AF and auto-area AF.

Please output the sorted data in the format of one Markdown table. The column names in the table are: Camera Model, Effective Pixels, Weight, Maximum Frames per Second, Shutter Speed Range, Highest Number of Focus Points, Digital Image Processor, ISO Range, In-camera Vibration Reduction Technology.

Don't ask me any questions, just output the results according to the columns without omitting cells arbitrarily. The output format is: 
 ```markdown
{data_content}
```.?

<think>
To answer this question, I need to gather detailed technical specifications for all Nikon Z series cameras as of the first half of 2025. I'll start by searching for this information.
</think>
<search>all Nikon Z series products as of the first half of 2025 technical specifications</search>

Search query: all Nikon Z series products as of the first half of 2025 technical specifications
Result: [Doc 1](https://photographylife.com/nikon-z-series):
Nikon Z Explained: Complete List of Cameras, Lenses & More (2026) This article is a bird's eye view of all Nikon Z System products available at the moment, including cameras, lenses, and official accessories.

[Doc 2](https://www.bhphotovideo.com/explora/photography/buying-guide/best-nikon-z-cameras-and-lenses-of-2025):
Best Nikon Z Cameras and Lenses of 2025 - B&H Photo We're exploring the best releases from Nikon in 2025, from upgrades to existing cameras and lenses to integrations of RED Cinema technology.

[Doc 3](https://caitlinandluke.com/nikon-mirrorless-cameras/):
The Ultimate Guide to Nikon Mirrorless Cameras in 2025 Compact & Lightweight: We get smaller camera bodies without giving up solid build quality. · Innovative Mount Design: That 55mm diameter Z-mount ...
<search>Nikon Z series cameras technical specs as of first half 2025</search>

Search query: Nikon Z series cameras technical specs as of first half 2025
Result: [Doc 1](https://photographylife.com/nikon-z-series):
Nikon Z Explained: Complete List of Cameras, Lenses & More (2026) The Nikon Z50 is a 21-megapixel “upper entry level” mirrorless camera with surprisingly good specifications. It shoots 11 frames per second stills as well as 4K ...

[Doc 2](https://www.nikonusa.com/c/cameras/mirrorless-cameras/overview?srsltid=AfmBOopaKNh_ApqIN4ZIADymRzbxwm3-IaGRwmnoGHhekRZkscQHb8py):
Mirrorless Cameras | Nikon USA APS-C size (DX format); 20.9MP sensor; Vari-angle selfie/vlogger LCD; 2+ hours continuous recording; 4K/30p and 1080/120p; Auto mode makes it easy.

[Doc 3](https://www.bhphotovideo.com/explora/photography/buying-guide/best-nikon-z-cameras-and-lenses-of-2025):
Best Nikon Z Cameras and Lenses of 2025 - B&H Photo We're exploring the best releases from Nikon in 2025, from upgrades to existing cameras and lenses to integrations of RED Cinema technology.

It seems the most recent specific technical specs might not be detailed or available online directly. I'll attempt to find more detailed specifications for each model individually.
<search>Nikon Z6 II technical specs</search>

Search query: Nikon Z6 II technical specs
Result: [Doc 1](https://www.nikonusa.com/p/z-6ii/1659/overview?srsltid=AfmBOopY95_I8YSGCv0GDjgYVddI9WdHe27YLaGq8iaaE45UmcG6JrC1):
Nikon Z 6II | Mirrorless Cameras The Nikon Z 6II is full frame hybrid powerhouse, with a 24.5 MP BSI sensor, dual processors, dual card slots, 4K UHD video and outstanding low-light ...

[Doc 2](https://www.dpreview.com/products/nikon/slrs/nikon_z6ii/specifications):
Nikon Z6 II full specifications: Digital Photography Review Price. MSRP, $1995 (body only), $2599 (w/24-70 F4 lens). Body type. Body type, SLR-style mirrorless. Sensor. Max resolution, 6048 x 4024.

[Doc 3](https://imaging.nikon.com/imaging/lineup/mirrorless/z_6_2/):
Z 6II | Mirrorless Cameras - Consumer - Nikon Full frame · 24.5 megapixels · ISO 100-51200 · Dual EXPEED 6 · 273 AF points · Eye-/Animal-Detection AF for stills · Eye-/Animal-Detection AF for videos · 14 fps.

Now I have enough details on Z6II. I will follow similar searches for other models.
</think>
<search>Nikon Z7 II technical specs</search>

Result: [Doc 1](https://www.nikonusa.com/p/z-7ii/1653/overview?srsltid=AfmBOooPXecNLk-lKzNfXOCW1n6wsxsAjZJsdzUZBXYR0ezG57VLyJaO):
Nikon Z 7II | Mirrorless Cameras The Nikon Z 7II is the next generation of Nikon mirrorless. The Z 7II is a full frame, 45.7 MP camera with dual processors, 4K UHD video at 60p and two card ...

Nikon Z7 II full specifications: Digital Photography Review Price. MSRP, $2999 (body only), $3499 (w/24-70 F4 lens). Body type. Body type, SLR-style mirrorless. Sensor. Max resolution, 8256 x 5504.

Search query: Nikon Z50 technical specs
Result: [Doc 1](https://imaging.nikon.com/imaging/lineup/mirrorless/z_50/):
Z 50 | Mirrorless Cameras | Nikon Consumer Wi-Fi/Bluetooth · Standards: IEEE 802.11b/g/n/a/ac · Operating frequency: 2412 to 2462 MHz (channel 11) and 5180 to 5320/5180 to 5825/5180 to 5805 MHz · Maximum ...

Nikon Z50 full specifications: Digital Photography Review Price. MSRP, $859 (body), $999 (w/16-50mm lens), $1349 (w/16-50 and 50-250mm lenses). Body type. Body type, SLR-style mirrorless.
